column5: Hi there, Does anybody know what is required to bring in leeches to canada from the US? Thank you
You can't do it. Can't bring minnows, leeches or night crawlers in dirt into Canada from the U.S.
Can u bring in Berkley Gulp alive leeches?Sent from my LGMS323 using Tapatalk
I see that you're in Alberta....I think the rules that most of us on this board are familiar with will be those of Ontario. I'd look at the Alberta regs.
You can bring in Gulp leeches.
Thanks SmallmouthHunterSent from my LGMS323 using Tapatalk
Thanks guys! Terrible shortage of leeches here in Alberta. Looking to the south for a steady supply. Geoff
